0.2.name: wordpress/doorman
0.2.description:
Stops people from registering at your blog with a disposable mail address by matching them with a provided list of over 200 known disposable mail providers. Additionally you can define your own blacklist and whitelist. If the domain is not found in the provided list the mail address is checked with botscout.com.

Coming soon * Create log of rejected registration attempts * Block bots and spammers from posting comments
